title: Add flake checks
Fix SSH StrictHostKeyChecking vulnerability
description:
**File:** home/george/configuration.nix:207

```nix
StrictHostKeyChecking = "no"
```

**Risk:** Makes MITM attacks possible for all SSH connections
**Fix:** Only disable for specific trusted hosts, or remove entirely

title: Fix spectre_oxi build missing lua symbols during linking
description:
Location: home/george/nixvim.nix:666

The spectre neovim plugin is currently disabled (spectre.enable = false) because the spectre_oxi build is missing lua symbols during linking.

This needs investigation to fix the build issue and re-enable the plugin.

title: Fix wallpaper path issue
description:
**File:** stylix.nix:7

```nix
image = ./wallpaper.jpeg;
```

- Local file not tracked in git; may break on fresh clone
- **Fix:** Add to git or use URL with pkgs.fetchurl

title: Fix platform-specific library extension in codesnap-nvim overlay
description:
## Summary
The codesnap-nvim overlay in `overlays.nix:199-202` hardcodes `.dylib` (macOS library extension), which will fail on Linux where the extension should be `.so`.

## Current code (overlays.nix:199-202)
```nix
function fetch.ensure_lib()
  return "...${vprev.codesnap-nvim.passthru.codesnap-lib}/lib/libgenerator.dylib"
end
```

## Fix
Use platform-conditional extension:
```nix
libExt = if pkgs.stdenv.isDarwin then "dylib" else "so";
# Then: libgenerator.${libExt}
```

## Acceptance criteria
- [ ] Detect platform and use appropriate library extension
- [ ] Test on both Darwin and Linux builds

title: Remove global allowInsecure flag
description:
**File:** modules/common.nix:62

```nix
allowInsecure = true;
```

**Risk:** May allow installation of packages with known vulnerabilities
**Fix:** Remove or document why it's necessary; use per-package overrides instead

title: Add platform conditionals for Darwin-specific paths
description:
## Summary
Several files contain hardcoded Darwin-specific paths that will fail on NixOS.

## Affected files and paths

### home/george/darwin.nix:19
- `/usr/bin/ssh-add` - Darwin-specific binary location

### modules/home/town.nix:16
- `/opt/homebrew/bin/op` - Homebrew-installed 1Password CLI (see also nixcfg-ugs)

### home/george/python.nix:33
- `Library/Application Support` - macOS application support directory

### home/george/configuration.nix:30
- `:/usr/bin:/sbin` in PATH - Darwin system paths

### modules/darwin/george/dock-apps.nix, town-dock-apps.nix
- `/System/Applications/*.app`, `/Applications/*.app` - Darwin app paths

## Acceptance criteria
- [ ] Add platform conditionals or move to darwin-specific modules
- [ ] Ensure linux equivalents exist where applicable
- [ ] Document any Darwin-only functionality

title: Reduce machine configuration duplication
Clean up commented code
description:
Several files have commented-out code that should be removed or documented:

- git.nix:38-42 - difftastic (replaced by delta)
- configuration.nix:153-167 - ghostty config duplicate
- go.nix:15-19 - go zsh plugin
- packages.nix:6 - gitbutler

title: Add NixOS support infrastructure
description:
## Summary
This codebase is Darwin-first and cannot build NixOS hosts. The infrastructure for cross-platform support exists in lib.nix (kernel detection, path abstractions), but NixOS-specific implementations are missing.

## Critical blockers

### Missing files that are imported but don't exist:
- `modules/home/linux.nix` - required by lib.nix:86 and lib.nix:152
- `home/george/nixos.nix` - required by home/george/configuration.nix:14

### Empty/stub files:
- `modules/nixos/base.nix` - contains only `{ }`

### Missing directories:
- `nixos/` - no directory for NixOS host configurations

## Flake output limitation
The flake uses `flakelight-darwin` which only generates `darwinConfigurations`. Need to add `nixosConfigurations` support.

## Acceptance criteria
- Create `modules/home/linux.nix` with systemd user services
- Create `home/george/nixos.nix` for Linux-specific home config
- Populate `modules/nixos/base.nix` with boot loader, systemd, etc.
- Create `nixos/` directory structure
- Add `nixosConfigurations` to flake outputs

title: Re-enable mac-app-util nixpkgs follows once SBCL on Darwin is fixed
description:
Location: flake.nix:45

The mac-app-util input has nixpkgs.follows commented out. The issue is that gitlab.common-lisp.net returns HTML (bot protection) instead of tar.gz when fetching SBCL.

This should be re-enabled once the upstream SBCL on Darwin issue is resolved.

title: Consolidate theme configuration
description:
Theme (Catppuccin Frappe) is configured in multiple places:

- stylix.nix:7 - base theme
- nixvim.nix:67-99 - explicit colorscheme
- configuration.nix:112-116 - bat theme
- git.nix:49 - delta theme

**Fix:** Create single theme.nix module with variables other modules reference

title: Document disabled features
description:
Several features are disabled without explanation:

- zsh.nix:255 - Zellij integration disabled
- nixvim.nix:665 - spectre_oxi plugin (TODO comment)
- nixvim.nix:644 - kulala plugin commented out
- stylix.nix:9-16 - bat, nixvim, vscode targets disabled

Add comments explaining *why* each is disabled.

title: Implement secrets management
description:
**Current State:** No encryption; metadata in plain text (meta.nix)

**Recommended:** Implement agenix or sops-nix:

```nix
# Example with agenix
age.secrets.gpgKey.file = ../secrets/gpg-key.age;
programs.gpg.settings.default-key = config.age.secrets.gpgKey.path;
```

title: Add NixOS equivalents for Darwin system services
Add input documentation to flake.nix
description:
**File:** flake.nix

28 non-flake inputs lack explanation. Add comments:

```nix
# Vim plugins not available in nixpkgs
zsh-system-clipboard = { url = "..."; flake = false; };
```

title: Split monolithic overlays.nix (226 lines)
description:
**File:** overlays.nix

Currently mixes Go, Python, Rust, and Vim plugins. Recommended:

```
overlays/
├── default.nix        # Imports all overlays
├── go-packages.nix    # beads, stars
├── python-packages.nix # beads-mcp, toad
├── vim-plugins.nix    # treesitter overrides, codesnap
└── utils.nix          # homebrew-zsh-completion, mountpoint-s3
```

title: Parameterize hardware-specific values
description:
**File:** modules/home/macbook-pro-16in.nix:2-12

```nix
dimensions = { columns = 250; lines = 80; };
position = { x = 433; y = 400; };
```

- Magic numbers not portable across displays
- **Fix:** Make configurable via module options or remove

title: Split large nixvim.nix (902 lines)
description:
**File:** home/george/nixvim.nix

The file is too large to maintain effectively. Recommended split:

```
home/george/nixvim/
├── default.nix       # Main entry, imports all
├── plugins.nix       # Plugin configurations (~400 lines)
├── keymaps.nix       # Keybindings (~130 lines)
├── lsp.nix           # LSP servers (~100 lines)
├── colorscheme.nix   # Theme settings
└── autocmds.nix      # Autocommands
```

title: Fix hardcoded 1Password path
description:
**File:** modules/home/town.nix:16

```nix
HOME=$(mktemp -d) /opt/homebrew/bin/op completion zsh > $out/_op
```

**Risk:** Breaks on Intel Macs (/usr/local/bin) or if 1Password not installed
**Fix:** Use pkgs._1password or make conditional with lib.optionalAttrs
